languages.text: {n}На лице Абеляра лежат глубокие тени усталости, однако взгляд старого офицера цепок. Он придирчиво оглядывает вас с ног до головы, хмурится, бурчит что-то под нос, потом кивает сам себе.{/n} "Что ж, Ваша Светлость..."

{n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Абеляра лежат глубокие тени усталости, однако взгляд старого офицера цепок. Он придирчиво оглядывает вас с ног до головы, хмурится, бурчит что-то под нос, потом кивает сам себе.{/n} "Что ж, Ваша Светлость..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

{n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

{n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

{n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

languages.text: {n}尽管阿贝拉德的脸上蒙上了一层疲惫的阴影，但这位老军官的目光依然炯炯有神。他从头到脚地打量着你，皱着眉头，嘀咕了些什么，之后点了点头。{/n}“嗯，您来了，大人……”
languages.original_text: {n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管阿贝拉德的脸上蒙上了一层疲惫的阴影，但这位老军官的目光依然炯炯有神。他从头到脚地打量着你，皱着眉头，嘀咕了些什么，之后点了点头。{/n}“嗯，您来了，大人……”

languages.text: {n}アベラードの顔には深い疲労の影が見えるが、それでもその眼光は鋭い。彼らは頭からつまさきまであなたを非難した。彼は顔をしかめ、何かをつぶやいた後、ひとりうなずいた。{/n}「それでは、{mf|陛下|陛下}…」
languages.original_text: {n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラードの顔には深い疲労の影が見えるが、それでもその眼光は鋭い。彼らは頭からつまさきまであなたを非難した。彼は顔をしかめ、何かをつぶやいた後、ひとりうなずいた。{/n}「それでは、{mf|陛下|陛下}…」

languages.text: {n}Tiefe Schatten der Erschöpfung zeichnen sich auf Abelards Gesicht ab, obwohl der Blick des alten Offiziers klar ist. Er mustert dich von Kopf bis Fuß – verzieht das Gesicht, murmelt etwas und nickt dann.{/n} "Tja, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tiefe Schatten der Erschöpfung zeichnen sich auf Abelards Gesicht ab, obwohl der Blick des alten Offiziers klar ist. Er mustert dich von Kopf bis Fuß – verzieht das Gesicht, murmelt etwas und nickt dann.{/n} "Tja, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..."

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Abélard est creusé par la fatigue, mais les yeux du vieil officier restent vifs. Il vous examine de la tête aux pieds, fronce les sourcils, puis hoche la tête en marmonnant quelque chose.{/n} « Eh bien, Votre Seigneurie... »
languages.original_text: {n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Abélard est creusé par la fatigue, mais les yeux du vieil officier restent vifs. Il vous examine de la tête aux pieds, fronce les sourcils, puis hoche la tête en marmonnant quelque chose.{/n} « Eh bien, Votre Seigneurie... »

languages.text: {n}Puedes observar unas profundas sombras de cansancio en el rostro de Abelard, aunque la mirada del viejo oficial sigue atenta. Sus ojos te estudian de pies a cabeza, y, acto seguido, frunce el ceño, murmura algo y asiente para sí mismo.{/n} «Muy bien, {mf|milord|milady}...».
languages.original_text: {n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Puedes observar unas profundas sombras de cansancio en el rostro de Abelard, aunque la mirada del viejo oficial sigue atenta. Sus ojos te estudian de pies a cabeza, y, acto seguido, frunce el ceño, murmura algo y asiente para sí mismo.{/n} «Muy bien, {mf|milord|milady}...».

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın yorgunluğu, yüzündeki derin gölgelerden okunabiliyor olsa da yaşlı subayın gözleri hâlâ keskin. Seni tepeden tırnağa süzüyor, kaşlarını çatıyor, bir şeyler mırıldanıyor ve nihayet başını sallıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri..."
languages.original_text: {n}Deep shadows of weariness can be seen on Abelard's face, though the old officer's eyes are keen. They rake over you from head to toe — he frowns, mutters something, then nods to himself.{/n} "Well, then, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard'ın yorgunluğu, yüzündeki derin gölgelerden okunabiliyor olsa da yaşlı subayın gözleri hâlâ keskin. Seni tepeden tırnağa süzüyor, kaşlarını çatıyor, bir şeyler mırıldanıyor ve nihayet başını sallıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri..."
